billhistory.lastaction: 03/13/2015 H Referred to Homeland Security & Public Safety: Mar 13 2015 6:08PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to fingerprints collected by the Texas Department of Public Safety from an applicant for a driver's license or personal identification certificate and used for the department's image verification system.
billhistory.companions: SB 398 by Schwertner, Similar | SB 1134 by Campbell, Identical | HB 3016 by Fletcher, Duplicate

action.description: Referred to Homeland Security & Public Safety
